name: Densha de PICO-8
description:
This is my first release of pretty much anything game related.  It's a fun proof-of-concept that lets you drive a train in a manner similar to the Japanese Densha de Go series of PlayStation games from 20+ years ago. Bonus forum points are awarded if the train is correctly identified as my local light rail system.

Learned a ton as I knew nothing about PICO-8 or Lua as of Christmas 2019.

Any updates will be posted on the PICO-8 BBS here:
https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=36527

Huge thanks go to bridgs and her series of tutorials on YouTube. I bootstrapped myself based on her excellent content.

Here is a link to her tutorials:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2Ea8uwt3r2NOttXY8gcOSw
